Uses of Class
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util.EntryPoint

  • Packages that use EntryPoint 
    Package Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom
    BetterRandom is a library designed to help improve the quality and performance of random-number generation on Java.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng
    Implementations of Random.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter
    Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util
    Miscellaneous utilities.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double BaseSplittableRandomAdapter.nextDouble(double bound)
      Returns a pseudorandom double value between 0.0 (inclusive) and the specified bound (exclusive).
      double BaseSplittableRandomAdapter.nextDouble(double origin, double bound)
      Returns a pseudorandom double value between the specified origin (inclusive) and bound (exclusive).
      int BaseSplittableRandomAdapter.nextInt(int origin, int bound)
      Returns a pseudorandom int value between the specified origin (inclusive) and the specified bound (exclusive).
      long BaseSplittableRandomAdapter.nextLong(long bound)
      Returns a pseudorandom long value between zero (inclusive) and the specified bound (exclusive).
      long BaseSplittableRandomAdapter.nextLong(long origin, long bound)
      Returns a pseudorandom long value between the specified origin (inclusive) and the specified bound (exclusive).
